help.personStepSubtitle: Please help us to quickly assess the situation better.
help.situationStepSubtitle: Thank you! What has happened? After making the following selection, you will be connected directly to the awareness team.
help.waitingMessage: A team member has been notified and will respond to you in a minute.
help.waitingMessageAccepted: A team member will be with you in a minute.

unknownPosition.title: Location independent incident
unknownPosition.body: Somebody is waiting for your message

chat.automaticFirstMessage: Hello, thank you for getting in touch. Would you like someone from our team to make their way to you, or would you report something anonymously?
chat.automaticUnavailableMessage: Hey, currently saferspaces is not active here. Please get in contact with the staff nearby.

feedback.text: If something happened that you would like to tell us, please use our report form.

request.title: New Help Request
request.body: Someone needs help. Make sure someone is looking after you.

response.body: Someone from your team is looking after you.
response.title: All good

automaticResponse.title: Important!
automaticResponse.body: Someone needs help. Make sure someone is looking after you.
